coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the box reads 'Packed by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Fish and Chips
coreAttributes.description: A takeaway box of deep fried potatoes and battered cod with a dip made from mashed peas. On the box is a portrait of an otter-girl in a barmaid costume winking at the viewer.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the box and [npc.verb(breathe)] in the scent of the hot grease and fried starch. Unable to resist the delicious looking meal inside, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] shoving pieces into [npc.her] mouth until the entire box has been emptied.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] glass cover from the plate and [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to breathe in the scent of hot grease and fried starch. Unable to resist the delicious-looking mean inside, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] shoving pieces into [npc2.her] mouth until the entire box has been emptied.
